title: Sion Q and R
body:
Just Did a  Ranked game with Sion. Q was working fine at the start, after 6 ... Q and R did not work. couldn't even use mouse to proc them.
in game i changed the abilities to a s d f  and still no luck( that rules out it is a key board fault)

is this a bug? could you please check this Riot. 

cheers

replies.body: this is still happening its the Q and R work for the first 10min then stop this has happened twice to me today grrr
Nuh sometimes unblind the q and r key 2 a and c use it once then unblind it again and set it back to q and it shoukd work again
Just close game client and reconnect and it will fix itself :)
this bug was happening ages ago when he was 1st released after remake I believe riot fixed it but it seems its back send a support ticket to riot and they should be able to get this bug solved
